tool_description: Sentimental is a GPT-3.5/ChatGPT-powered text analysis API, designed to provide a comprehensive set of metrics for text evaluation. It offers an array of essential measurements, including spam detection, grammar assessment, sentiment analysis, scholarly evaluation, humor detection, violence detection, and sexual content scoring. Additionally, it includes a reliable language identifier and the capability to determine if the text is suitable for young audiences. The API can be integrated into i...

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentimental2.p.rapidapi.com/Analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentimental2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
